title: It will be the responsibility of the Architect/Licensed Surveyor on Record, to inform the Commission
clause_text: It will be the responsibility of the Architect/Licensed Surveyor on Record, to inform the Commissioner, immediately, regarding any unauthorized work/ development and also to inform the
